overview: This film was made in 52 hours for the Belhaven B52 Film Challenge.  It won in the College/Adult Category.  The prompts given were:  There must be a theme of perseverance.  There must be a water bottle.  And there must be something orange.  Clifford has found out about a big score and he convinces Tweety Bird to go along with him to get it.
title: The Big Score
